tweet.text: Three weeks after the fall of the Berlin Wall, Gorbachev and Pres. George H.W. Bush met at the Malta Summit Dec. 2–3, 1989. At Malta, Gorbachev proclaimed, “the world leaves one epoch of cold war and enters another epoch.” 📷 @Bush41Library (ID: P08488-18) (1/4) https://t.co/VQYucP65U0
tweet.html: Three weeks after the fall of the Berlin Wall, Gorbachev and Pres. George H.W. Bush met at the Malta Summit Dec. 2–3, 1989. At Malta, Gorbachev proclaimed, “the world leaves one epoch of cold war and enters another epoch.” 📷 @Bush41Library (ID: P08488-18) (1/4)
